title: takes 1-2 minutes to load stats post game
body:
When the game ends, the post game screen pops up blank with a small loading circle. 

About 1-2 minutes later, the stats show up.. but everyone has already left lobby. 

I can't talk trash.. I mean- Congratulate the enemy team if they beat me out of the room every time.

replies.body:
http://www.abc.net.au/news/image/7945432-3x2-940x627.jpg

Jokes aside, this sounds like your network is able to handle the connection with our game servers, but for some reason it's having a hard time grabbing the data to show on the after match screen. Run through our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can narrow down what the main issue is.
